    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

explode = [0,0.2,0,0,0,0,0,0]
plt.figure(figsize = (20,8))
plt.pie(count_1.CoffeeType,labels = count_1.index,wedgeprops = {'edgecolor':'black'},explode = explode,shadow = True,startangle = 150,autopct = '%1.1f%%')
